{{Infobox/Jutsu |image=Ice Release Swallow Snow Storm.PNG |kanji=氷遁・ツバメ吹雪 |unnamed jutsu=No |romaji=Hyōton: Tsubame Fubuki |literal english=Ice Release: Swallow Snow Storm |english tv=Ice Style: Tsubame Blizzard |game names=Ice Style: Tsubame Snowstorm''Naruto Collectible Card Game''
Ice Style: Swallow Snowstorm''Naruto Mobile'' |jutsu classification=Ninjutsu |jutsu type=Ice Release |jutsu class type=Offensive |jutsu range=Short, Mid |users=Fubuki Kakuyoku, Haku~game |hand signs=Tiger |boruto=No |debut shippuden=No |boruto anime=No |game debut=Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 2 |movie debut=Naruto the Movie: Ninja Clash in the Land of Snow |jutsu media=Game, Movie }} This technique creates a cluster of ice needles in the shape of miniature swallows out of preexisting ice, which the user then launches at the opponent. These needles can change direction in midair and will maim the opponent with their sharp wings. This technique can be countered by [[Fire Release]] techniques, which in turn melts the ice. == Trivia == * In ''[[Naruto Mobile]]'', this technique is presented as simple shuriken imbued with Ice Release chakra. == References == [[es:Elemento Hielo: Tormenta de Golondrinas de Nieve]] [[pl:Hyōton: Tsubame Fubuki]] [[pt-br:Estilo Gelo: Andorinha da Tempestade de Neve]]
